title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 16, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of the Pulitzer Prize winning playwright Paula Vogel (1951). Author “How I Learned to Drive” and “The Baltimore Waltz.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
